org.drooms.impl.util.shortestpath.astar

Class UnweightedAStarShortestPath<V extends Node,E extends Edge>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drooms.impl.util.shortestpath.astar.UnweightedAStarShortestPath<V,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - Vertex.
    E - Edge.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.uci.ics.jung.algorithms.shortestpath.ShortestPath<V,E>

    public class UnweightedAStarShortestPath<V extends Node,E extends Edge>
extends Object
implements edu.uci.ics.jung.algorithms.shortestpath.ShortestPath<V,E>
    Implements the A* algorithm with various choices of distance-estimating heuristics. All edges are considered to have the same weight, that is 1.

        Find the shortest path between two nodes. Doesn't cache results.

        target - Target vertex.
        Returns:
